events.name: talk.js
events.description: talk.js is back in 2015! Scheduled Talks: * Web services: Why Node, Express and Postgres? - Calvin Tan * Struggles with Emscripten - A first hand experience on exploring the C world in JavaScript - Joshua Koo * Introduction to React.js - Ryo Chikazawa * SmartSuggestion.js - Riza Marhaban * io.js - Background & Introduction - Soares Chen * Lightning talks Be there 7pm for 7:15pm start. Venue, free drinks and pizza sponsored by Microsoft. Location: One Marina Boulevard, Level 21 Auditorium, Singapore 018989 Remember to bring photo ID to get through building security. See you there!
events.location: Microsoft Auditorium (Singapore), One Marina Boulevard, Level 21 Auditorium, Singapore 018989
